entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cleanup `[Out]` elements in guarded `if` #89897
  • Cleanup `out` parameters in guarded `if` #89896
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] PreserveSig with collection return type will not properly marshal back to caller #89893
  • Linear collection marshallers will generate calls to GetUnmanagedValuesDestination for 'out' variables during cleanup in ManagedToUnmanaged #89885
  • [browser] loadBootResource should not ask for `dotnetwasm` location before cache lookup #89883
    8.0.0
  • Missing Microsoft.AspNetCore (.net 8) ARM Packages Blocking Build #89881
  • [Xamarin.Android] Performance regression between net7 and net8 #89880
  • Configuration source generator should use ArgumentNullException.ThrowIfNull if it's available #89879
  • NativeAOT EventPipe drops events in multi-threaded scenarios. #89878
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT fails to resolve PInvoke in `System.Data.SqlClient` #89874
  • Windows cannot open the folder #89871
    Future
  • Incorrect codegen on Arm64 #89868
    8.0.0
  • Custom Marshaller analyzers don't warn when different native types are used for each marshalling method #89866
  • [browser] Support for other app settings #89861
    8.0.0
  • Private.InternalDiagnostics.System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateError TraceEvent Does Not Include the Underline TLS Error from macOS #89859
  • Ternary operator gives false result #89855
  • .net 7 Application not running when deployed to windows server. #89850
  • Consider postponing reading and parsing of `.deps.json` in `AssemblyDependencyResolver` #89849
    Future
  • JIT-EE interface cleanup #89845
    9.0.0
  • Issue with DateTime.Parse in Blazor WebAssembly #89844
    8.0.0
  • The type 'System.Int32[,]' is not supported. #89843
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Tests.ProcessStartInfoTests.TestWindowStyle failing in CI #89842
  • Offsets from first chance exception StackFrame are incorrect #89834
    8.0.0
  • Does HttpClientHandler Proxy Property Apply to CRL Checks? #89831
  • Test failure: System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests.JsonContentTests_Async.JsonContentMediaTypeDefaultIfNull #89830

Closed

  • ComInterfaceGenerator has guaranteed unmarshal after the managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89582
  • Regressions from "More precise writebarrier for regions" #73783
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Regression on 8/1/2022 6:03:22 PM #73630
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\plug\\plug.cmd #88977
    8.0.0
  • GCHeap::GetLastGCPercentTimeInGC incorrectly(?) returning 0 value #78053
    8.0.0
  • Test failure GC\\Scenarios\\NDPin\\ndpinfinal\\ndpinfinal.cmd #86562
    8.0.0
  • .NET 7 application hangs during GC #80073
    8.0.0
  • System.Threading.Tests.Perf_Timer.SynchronousContention has regressed on macOS x64 #66774
    8.0.0
  • Regression from "Mark phase prefetching" #73782
    8.0.0
  • Some crossgen2 SPMI collections still fail with "Read-only file system" errors #89851
    8.0.0
  • Comparers don't work for messy generic corner cases #89767
  • Support compressed symbols for Native AOT on Linux #85188
    Future
  • System.Reflection.Metadata.MetadataReader returns unexpected signature for a field within a .winmd file #52264
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.Serialization.Tests.ColdStartSerialization<SimpleStructWithProperties> #89794
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Startup activation of singletons #86075
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: update API signatures to leverage ref readonly parameters #85911
    Future
  • ASP.NET CI Broken on Linux ARM and Linux musl-x64 #89734
  • Ensure createdump works with NativeAOT applications #88904
    8.0.0
  • Are there currently any plans to integrate HttpClient's ProgressMessageHandler into the System.Net.Http package? #89854
  • API proposal: Activator.CreateFactory and ConstructorInfo.CreateDelegate #36194
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection work planned for .NET 8 #75358
    8.0.0
  • COM Interop not working on Linux builds #7968
    Future
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests segmentation fault #85046
  • [wasm] `S.R.IS.JavaScript.Tests.JSImportExportTest.JsImportTaskTypes` #77334
    8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Catch another unhandled exception in .js file after catching First Chance Exception #76101
    8.0.0
  • Improve enum parsing in config binder generator #88873
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: MemoryExtensions.ContainsAny{Except} #86528
    8.0.0
  • string Equals and IndexOf with OrdinalIgnoreCase don't agree under InvariantGlobalization #89591
    8.0.0
  • Unify behavior of nullable type in System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<TKey, TValue> #89812
  • [API Proposal]: Add Min and Max properties to SortedDictionary.Keys #89837
  • JsonElement returned from JsonElement.ParseValue contains disposable resource (JsonDocument) #89832
  • Breaking change in WebAssembly loadBootResource #89766
    8.0.0
  • [browser] "Expected asset to have the downloaded buffer" assert fails when specifying "buffer" in MonoConfig #89570
    8.0.0
  • [browser] Error in mono_download_assets: TypeError: pendingDownloadInternal is null #89510
    8.0.0
  • hex number format in .net 7 jit assembly #81329
    8.0.0
  • Align GetProcessInfo3 diagnostic command for MacCatalyst. #88325
    8.0.0
  • .NET 8 AOT: Internal.TypeSystem.TypeSystemException+FileNotFoundException: Failed to load assembly 'Microsoft.Extensions.Features' #89141
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT analysis doesn't warn when annotated item is accessed via ldtoken #80255
  • [API Proposal]: Add FileAttributes.None #83125
    8.0.0
  • NativeLibrary API: Provide facility to pass flags on Non-Windows #11828
    Future
  • [Test Failure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok(host: "www.microsoft.com") #89779
  • JsonStringEnumConverterAttribute is not considered when single enum value is serialized #89839
  • Assertion failed 'distVal <= CALL_DIST_MAX_POS' in 'CseTest.Test_Main:TestEntryPoint():int' during 'Emit code' #88621
    8.0.0
  • Unnecesary use of GCHandle in Windows Socket code #86513
    8.0.0
  • SerializationGuard bloats the binary size on NAOT #87470

PullRequests

Created

  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make marshaller types specific to each scenario #89894
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Use `StoreAligned` not `Store` in WidenAsciiToUtf16 #89892
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Serialize createdump core dump generation #89891
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix condition to use latest chrome for testing #89890
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Clarifications in botr gc section #89888
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Pass through ComWrappers based objects to COM type descriptor #89887
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Escape both CR and LF in IL disassembler #89886
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [PERF] Setup scheduled once a day runs rather than constant runs #89884
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add test for TypeIdentifierAttribute #89882
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement
  • Added issue 78891 regression test #89876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix startup without emcc -g option #89872
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Expose the RequiresLocationAttribute #89870
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [iOS] Remove cmake build dependency for library mode #89869
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: don't dead store OSR exposed locals #89867
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Tie llvm to emsdk's version #89865
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Speed up KeyAnalyzer for substring based frozen collections #89863
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Set VSTEST_TESTHOST_SHUTDOWN_TIMEOUT to 2s #89862
    Servicing-approved
  • [browser] app start benchmark fix #89857
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Add additional filter capabilities to dotnet-pgo tool. #89853
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • SPMI: Capture EE API exceptions in getNewHelper, and simplify the API shape a bit #89852
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use highest thread priority in linux #89848
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ArgumentOutOfRangeException: use corresponding default message for all overloads #89846
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • PoC: use approved SocketAddress API instead of direct internal access #89841
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Don't generate symbols if user doesn't want them #89840
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Rebaseline failing pri0 tests #89835
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Fix up AppTest tests to fix missed testing cases #89833
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Revert "[browser] Clean-up typescript code imported from Blazor (#89435)" #89828
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add diagnostic when the size of an array that is marshalled to the callee is an 'out' parameter. #89827
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [PERF] Add hybrid globalization testing runs #89825
    area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • Guaranteed unmarshal before managed call in unmanaged to managed stubs #89583
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm][debugger] Avoid step out if JMC is enabled before runtime is ready #89873
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] A few scalability fixes for the fat Lock #88633
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Create temp directory for SuperPMI JIT when running crossgen2 collections #89875
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix optimizations for comparers corner cases in native AOT #89829
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add `CompressSymbols` opt-out option in NativeAOT #85192
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Utilize the new `ref readonly` language feature #89736
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #88664
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.21
  • Fix DAC GetFlags() function for SOS #89679
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Add test COM interfaces #89864
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Apply mitigations for a recent STJ performance regression #89856
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix for delayed WS close event on NodeJs #89847
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Improve enum parsing in config binder generator #89823
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [browser] remove active issue 77334 #89676
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Update prepare-artifacts.proj #89803
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Fix Globalization Invariant string comparisons with ordinal ignore casing #89660
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Enable BinSkim scan in nightly validation #89728
    needs-area-label
  • SPMI: Gracefully handle managed exceptions during replay #89654
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add FileAttributes.None #89130
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [browser] fix loading assets #89687
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] Assure name starts with `icudt` + fix testing scenario. #89719
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix assetion in System.Threading.LowLevelLifoSemaphore.Wait #89826
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • JIT: Consistently use '0x' as the hex specifier #89773
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Align GetProcessinfo3 diagnostics command for MacCatalyst. #89780
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Fix iOS/Android sample diagnostics config. #89725
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add more verifications in EventPipe rundownvalidation test. #89623
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, area-Diagnostics-mono
  • Move SVM regression tests to a shorter path #89838
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add an option to run ILC with workstation GC #89836
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Change www.microsoft.com to www.github.com in test #89792
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Don't access AlgorithmGroup until necessary #89819
    area-System.Security
  • Make test `HugeField2` optimization sensitive for ARM32 #89824
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid allocating SocketAddress GCHandle for every ReceiveFromAsync #89808
    area-System.Net.Sockets, os-windows, 8.0.0
  • Debloat serialization guard #89706
    area-Serialization, size-reduction
  • [wasm][debugger] Do not pause on exceptions from our framework js files if JMC is enabled #89741
    area-Debugger-mono

Updated

  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • Improve zlib defenses on mono #89898
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Cleanup callee-allocated-only resources only if the call succeeds #89822
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [NativeAOT] macOS/iOS: Emit simple compact unwinding information #88724
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix stack overflow handling on Unix #89799
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Zlib: Add some protections to the allocator used by zlib #89532
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.x
  • Dynamic events #89371
    area-GC-coreclr
  • For perf, use the new ConstructorInvoker APIs for ActivatorUtilities.CreateFactory #89573
    tenet-performance, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.0
  • Support breakpoints on AVX-512 instructions #89705
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix handling ThreadAbortException at the end of catch #89781
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • [WASM] Add ILStrip task to wasm app build process #88926
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Adjust System.Net.Http metrics #89809
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • [Corrected] - Enable Libraries R2R Testing in CI #89405
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2235105 #89414
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix failed to fetch debugger MT tests #89737
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Remove hardcoded references to `net8.0` from WasmApp*targets #89699
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix Vector512 rightshift #89339
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512, 8.0.0
  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #89303
    area-HostModel, community-contribution
  • Integrate HttpClientFactory and metrics #86888
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory, 8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Make casting logic closer to CoreCLR #89548
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [nativeaot][ios] Improve Native AOT test coverage on apple mobile platforms #89301
    os-ios, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Convert.Try{From/To}HexString #86556
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • [ios][tests] Run functional tests with Mono and Native AOT on Helix #87773
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 8.0.0
  • [HttpClientFactory] Remove dependency on ILoggerFactory #89531
    area-Extensions-HttpClientFactory
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix COM object leak #89795
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DirectoryServices, 7.0.x
  • Change LoadDomainInfo to honor requested LDAP port #89787
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Adjust DNS metrics #89813
    area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Add SearchValues<string> #88394
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Buffers, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [Blazor] Add basic ICU tests #89771
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/6.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx": 2 for BrowserDebugHost #89003
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/7.0-staging] [wasm][debugger] Using "rollForwardOnNoCandidateFx": 2 for BrowserDebugHost #89004
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • [release/6.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89619
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix max chunk size limiting #81607
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0-staging] CI: Fix running the workaround for `NuGet-Migrations` issue #86812

  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 (#88772) #89335
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix encoding problem when publishing with AOT #89388
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, wasm-aot-test, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Update ds-ipc-pal-namedpipe to fix shutdown race #89620
    Servicing-consider, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #89815
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #89814
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [Mono] Fix deadlock during gcdump when using interp full AOT fallback. #89726
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix analysis issue in LDTOKEN dependencies #89757
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Quote whole commands to make it easier to consume linker args by Xamarin #88294
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Specify callback calling convention for callbacks on Windows x86 causes crashes on Mono. #89571
    arch-x86, area-Interop-mono, area-Diagnostics-mono

    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add log level and keyword tests for NativeRuntimeEventSource #89816
